headline: EQT Ties Natural Gas Story To Growing Data Center Power Demand
summary: EQT backed Scale Microgrids has acquired Reload, a Chicago based platform that develops large scale data center campuses paired with power infrastructure. The deal expands Scale Microgrids’ presence in the data center space, adding projects that link computing capacity with dedicated energy solutions. The move reflects NYSE:EQT’s interest in energy intensive infrastructure that sits alongside its existing natural gas operations. For you as an investor watching NYSE:EQT, this update sits at...
